C

clean() - Method in class com.hirschandmann.image.ISPlayer
stop playback and remove all frames
com.hirschandmann.image - package com.hirschandmann.image
 
currentFrame() - Method in class com.hirschandmann.image.ISPlayer

D

dispose() - Method in class com.hirschandmann.image.ISPlayer
stop playback and thread

G

getLoadProgress() - Method in class com.hirschandmann.image.ISPlayer
returns a normalized value (0.0 to 1.0) where 0 = 0%, 0.5 = 50%, 1.0 = 100%
getName() - Method in class com.hirschandmann.image.ISPlayer
Get the name of the sequence (typically the folder name)
getPImages() - Method in class com.hirschandmann.image.ISPlayer

H

hasFinishedPlaying() - Method in class com.hirschandmann.image.ISPlayer
returns true if the last frame was reached

I

init(String) - Method in class com.hirschandmann.image.ISPlayer

isLoading() - Method in class com.hirschandmann.image.ISPlayer
returns true as long as images have yet to fully load
isLooping() - Method in class com.hirschandmann.image.ISPlayer
returns true if the sequence is set to repeat from the first frame at the end of the last frame
ISPlayer - Class in com.hirschandmann.image
Image Sequence Player loads images in separate threads (use PApplet's requestImageMax to control how many image loading threads can be isStarted simultaneously)
ISPlayer(PApplet) - Constructor for class com.hirschandmann.image.ISPlayer
instantiate empty image sequence player
ISPlayer(PApplet, String) - Constructor for class com.hirschandmann.image.ISPlayer
instantiate image sequence player and load supported images from folder
isPlaying() - Method in class com.hirschandmann.image.ISPlayer
returns true if the playhead is automatically incremented

J

jump(int) - Method in class com.hirschandmann.image.ISPlayer
jump to a different frame (within the available number of frames this sequence holds)

L

loop() - Method in class com.hirschandmann.image.ISPlayer
resume playback and loop
loopOnly() - Method in class com.hirschandmann.image.ISPlayer
set loop flag to true, but don't resume playback yet

N

noLoop() - Method in class com.hirschandmann.image.ISPlayer
stop looping

P

pause() - Method in class com.hirschandmann.image.ISPlayer
pause playback
play() - Method in class com.hirschandmann.image.ISPlayer
play/resume

R

run() - Method in class com.hirschandmann.image.ISPlayer
handled by internal thread, don't call manually

S
